segments.text: Hello . I have left my key in my room . But I can't get in now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I have your name and room number ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am Molopo and my room is 5022 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK.sir . Please go upstairs . Someone will open the door for you .
segments.speaker: S2
